fields.subject: COVID-19 Test Results Ready
fields.body_template:
Hello {patient_name},

Your COVID-19 test results are ready. The diagnosis is: {diagnosis} with {confidence}% confidence.

Please click the link below to view your full results.

Thank you,
COVID-19 Detection System

fields.subject: URGENT: COVID-19 Positive Result
fields.body_template:
URGENT NOTIFICATION

Dear {patient_name},

Your COVID-19 test has returned a POSITIVE result with {confidence}% confidence.

Please take the following immediate actions:
1. Self-isolate immediately
2. Contact your healthcare provider
3. Inform close contacts
4. Monitor your symptoms

View your detailed results here: {action_url}

Stay safe,
COVID-19 Detection System

fields.subject: Appointment Reminder - {date}
Appointment Confirmed
Medical Report Available
Welcome to COVID-19 Detection System
fields.body_template:
Welcome {patient_name}!

Your account has been successfully created.

Username: {username}
Email: {email}

You can now log in and access all features of the COVID-19 Detection System.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
COVID-19 Detection System Team

fields.subject: Password Reset Request
fields.body_template:
Hello {patient_name},

We received a request to reset your password.

If you made this request, click the link below to reset your password:
{reset_link}

This link will expire in 24 hours.

If you didn't request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

Stay safe,
COVID-19 Detection System

fields.subject: Test Results Updated
Doctor's Notes Added to Your Case
fields.body_template:
Hello {patient_name},

Dr. {doctor_name} has added notes to your case.

Added: {added_date}

View the notes here: {action_url}

If you have questions about the notes, please contact your doctor.

Thank you,
COVID-19 Detection System
